title: Interviews with Rob Gronkowski and Nick Sirianni, Giants Offensive Stars Returning from Injuries, Nate Burleson is Back, New York Minute
itunes:title: Interviews with Rob Gronkowski and Nick Sirianni, Giants Offensive Stars Returning from Injuries, Nate Burleson is Back, New York Minute
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, DeAngelo Hall, Peter Schrager and Kyle Brandt discuss how the NFC East will shake out with New York Giants running back Saquon Barkley and wide receiver Kenny Golladay returning from injury. Tampa Bay Buccaneers tight end Rob Gronkowski and Philadelphia Eagles head coach Nick Sirianni join the show for live interviews. The crew also breaks down the latest headlines and makes season predictions in the speed of a New York minute. Nate Burleson also rejoins the show and weighs in on the New England Patriots quarterback moves and playing against DeAngelo Hall.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
